title: Trump Sets 10 15 Day Deadline for Iran Nuclear Deal

title: Venezuela Signs Amnesty Law That Could Free Hundreds of Political
snippets: Venezuela’s acting president Delcy Rodriquez signed an amnesty law that could free hundreds of political prisoners.

title: Devin Booker Exits Suns Spurs Game With Right Hip Soreness
snippets: Suns guard Devin Booker was ruled out in the first half Thursday night because of right hip soreness.

The Phoenix Suns will be without their leading scorer for the remainder of Thursday’s game. Devin Booker won’t return against the San Antonio Spurs due to right hip soreness, per the Suns’ sideline reporter. He exited the game with four minutes left in the first quarter, but returned in the second quarter to play just a couple of minutes before leaving again. Booker recorded five points and one rebound on 2-of-6 shooting in just eight minutes before the injury. The 29-year-old was averaging 25.2 points, 6.3 assists and four rebounds through 43 games entering Thursday.

The Phoenix Suns played their first game after the All-Star break on Thursday night, drawing the San Antonio Spurs in Austin. It felt like a useful measuring stick, a chance to see where Phoenix stood against one of the better teams in the league and a team they had already beaten twice this season.
Booker went into the locker room late in the second quarter of the Suns' game against the San Antonio Spurs on Thursday night. Here's what to know.
titles: Booker leaves Suns' loss to Spurs with sore hip

constructiveness_reason: This story offers basic awareness about an event in a sports game, but it doesn't provide any depth or insight into the situation, nor does it provide actionable insights for the reader.
summary: Devin Booker left the Phoenix Suns' game against the San Antonio Spurs on Thursday due to right hip soreness and was ruled out for the rest of the game. Booker exited in the first quarter, briefly returned in the second, but played only eight minutes total, scoring five points and grabbing one rebound before leaving.
